narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Applicant wishes to be licensed as a class "B" dealer.  License fee must be submitted directly to the Region Office
located in Raleigh, NC.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
This inspection report was sent to the Applicant by email.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
